prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful personality and soft blue colors.
I want a cute, aquatic Pokemon that resembles a small blue creature with unique features.
Generate a Pokemon design that has a cheerful expression and prominent gills.
Make a fantasy creature that blends aquatic elements with a bright and friendly appearance.
Imagine a small, blue Pokemon that thrives in wet environments and loves to play.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that embodies the essence of water and has a charming smile.
Show me a playful little creature that is perfect for a water-themed adventure.
